sentences.english: A large-scdraugustht beer painting! usuficnearlyy on a wa certainy ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 一樣平常掛在牆上或天花板上的巨幅畫。

sentences.english: A large-scale painting, usually on a wall or ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 一般掛正在牆上或天花板上的巨幅畫。

sentences.english: A couple point out sites on massive map along a wall in Mount Kumgang resort.
sentences.chinese: 一對姐妹在金剛山景區巨幅地圖前找位置。

sentences.english: Five giant backdrops beckon the visitor into the Trianon garden by night.
sentences.chinese: 五面巨幅帷幕將參觀者引入夜色中的特里阿農園。

sentences.english: She said that taking advantage of a good light now, we should accelerate the completion of this huge paper-cutting.
sentences.chinese: 她說，趁着現在光線好，要加緊完成這一巨幅剪紙。

sentences.english: There’s been a dramatic drop in circulation.
sentences.chinese: 發行量出現了巨幅下滑。

sentences.english: A giant poster of Olympic champion hurdler Liu Xiang hangs on a new clothing store in downtown Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 劉翔的巨幅海報就掛在北京市中心一家服裝店門外。

sentences.english: As he told me this, he was standing underneath a giant oil painting of himself.
sentences.chinese: 他跟我說這個的時候，正站在他的巨幅自畫油畫像前。

sentences.english: A large-scale painting, usually on a wall or ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 通常掛在牆上或天花板上的巨幅畫。

definition: portrait (painting, photo etc)/(in a general sense) representation of a person/likeness
portrait/to do a portrait of sb
